column4: Hi guys - trying to upgrade from Feisty to Gutsy, and am getting an error message about not being able to retrieve the "...feisty-security/restricted/binary-i386/Packages.gz", it appears the file on the server isn't compressed, but the update manager thinks it should be....
(And I am surprised, I would think .gz would be a gzipped file..."
okay, I take it that sources.list is somehwere under /etc?
